title: Pool Party Renekton
body:
This is just amazing, Taringa user Gero22piceda didn´t feel like going for another drawing, instead he created this awesome Pool Party Renekton figure. In his post he mentions that it took him quite some time and didn´t post too many pics, but the final result is just awesome.

Check out his pics [here](http://www.taringa.net/posts/arte/18029786/Figura-de-Renekton-League-of-legends-P22.html)

replies.body: I think i just had a fangasm
That's awesome! The details are insane.. Great job to the artist! Thanks for posting! I would love to see him create more of these.
